description:
Friends step in to help Tenma break the lunch rut by setting up a date - with curry on the menu, of course - but a stop at a sidewalk psychic could spoil the romantic atmosphere!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyvä Jumala! / Hyvä ennustajaukko! / Tenma kiltti!
Onegai Kamisama! / Onegai! Real Doubutsu Uranai! / Onegai!! Tenma-chan!
Please, God! / Please, Genuine Animal Fortune-Telling! / Please, Tenma!
お願い 神さま! / お願い! リアル動物占い! / お願い!! 天満ちゃん!
